exportFormats.name: CREATE READING SHEET (ARTICLE)
exportFormats.outputPathTemplate: 👩🏽‍🔬 LITTERATURE_NOTES/ANNOTATIONS/{% set authorCount = creators | length %} {% if authorCount == 1 %}({{creators[0].lastName}}, {{date | format("YYYY")}}){% elif authorCount == 2 %}({{creators[0].lastName}} & {{creators[1].lastName}}, {{date | format("YYYY")}}){% else %}({{creators[0].lastName}} et al., {{date | format("YYYY")}}){% endif %}.md
exportFormats.imageOutputPathTemplate: 👩🏽‍🔬 LITTERATURE_NOTES/MEDIA/{% set authorCount = creators | length %} {% if authorCount == 1 %}({{creators[0].lastName}}, {{date | format("YYYY")}}){% elif authorCount == 2 %}({{creators[0].lastName}} & {{creators[1].lastName}}, {{date | format("YYYY")}}){% else %}({{creators[0].lastName}} et al., {{date | format("YYYY")}}){% endif %}/
